SEARCH
Module overrungl.opengl
Package overrungl.opengl

Class GL14C

java.lang.Object
overrungl.opengl.GL10C
overrungl.opengl.GL11C
overrungl.opengl.GL12C
overrungl.opengl.GL13C
overrungl.opengl.GL14C
Direct Known Subclasses:
GL14, GL15C
public sealed class GL14C extends GL13C permits GL14, GL15C
GL14C relies on preview features of the Java platform:
  • GL14C refers to one or more preview APIs: MemorySegment, SegmentAllocator.
Programs can only use GL14C when preview features are enabled.
Preview features may be removed in a future release, or upgraded to permanent features of the Java platform.
The OpenGL 1.4 forward compatible functions.

These extensions are promoted in this version:

  • GL_ARB_imaging
  • GL_ARB_point_parameters
  • GL_ARB_shadow
  • GL_ARB_texture_mirrored_repeat
Since:
0.1.0
Author:
squid233
